question: Who has won the 2017 Man Booker Prize?
explanation: US author George Saunders has won the 2017 Man Booker Prize for his first full-length novel \"Lincoln in the Bardo\" and became only the 2nd American writer to win Â£50,000 ($66,000) Britain\'s prestigious English-language literary award. The book is a fictional account of US President Abraham Lincoln burying his 11-year-old son Willie at a Washington cemetery. In 2016, American author Paul Beatty became the first American to win the award for his novel \'The Sellout\', a biting satire on race relations in the US.
